categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Marric was a Human male who was a colonel of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Cold War. Marric was a war hero of Balmorra and high-ranking member of the Balmorran resistance who, in truth, worked for the Sith Empire undercover and revealed finally his allegiance during the Liberation of Sobrik by a Republic individual. Marric was defeated by the individual, and taken into custody.
Marric appears in the mission "Liberating Sobrik" for Republic classes in the 2011 BioWare MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic.
